  AB-CO  Industrial  Systems  Section

 SubSection Pages    IS/CR -  IS/FS -  IS/LS -  IS/PC  -  IS/WS    SubSection Pages
   

 Mandate

  • Definition, selection and implementation of industrial control and supervision systems for
    LHC machines equipment, including cryogenics.
  • Definition, selection and implementation of laboratory control systems for development and production test facilities of LHC machine equipment.
  • CERN-wide consultancy and support for promoting convergence in industrial control
